items.sentence: It now takes me longer to do things than it used to.
Another batch of cookies are coming out of the oven.
They say we'll have an earthquake one of these days.
The doctor reassured me about my father's condition.
The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.
Tom lives in a three-story house in the city center.
The video cameras are mainly there to deter thieves.
I wonder what it would be like to be married to Tom.
I still can't believe Tom and I are getting married.
I didn't know Tom was famous when we started dating.
Do you think Tom would really want to dance with me?
I haven't had a boyfriend since I broke up with Tom.
Why didn't you ever tell me that you studied French?
Tom let himself in using the key that I'd given him.
Tom turned himself in three days after killing Mary.
It seems like we've been talking about this all day.
I think you know that we need to buy some more food.
I need to know you're doing what we asked you to do.
The soldier who stopped the bus made us all get off.
Every time Tom's parents would argue, Tom would cry.
Tom tried to convince me to stay with him in Boston.
I've been waiting for you to tell me how to do this.
Would you rather live in a small town or a big city?
The last time we were together was three months ago.
We just walked by each other without saying a thing.
Tom walked over to one of the windows and opened it.
It's never too early to start saving for retirement.
It'll be a challenge to get this done before winter.
Isn't it true that only boys are allowed to do that?
I can't believe that you aren't planning to do that.
Tom has always been a much better swimmer than Mary.
I want to know if you're really planning to do that.
I want you to give me money to buy something to eat.
Tom isn't dealing with his father's death very well.
When I left, Tom gave me a very good recommendation.
If you climb up this mountain, you'll reach the lab.
Just to warn you in advance, today's blog is no fun.
The book that Tom threw at Mary hit her in the face.
I don't know what kind of fruit Tom wants me to buy.
I think it'll be possible to get this ink stain out.
Tom spent the night in the haunted house by himself.
I certainly do hope that you've learned your lesson.
How many years ago did you realize you were adopted?
The room the kidnappers locked me in had no windows.
The plants must've died because nobody watered them.
I know it's highly unlikely that anyone can help me.
Tom will live in Australia for at least three years.
Tom went to Australia to live with his grandparents.
Most people stuck around for a while after the show.
We are eating now. Could you please call back later?
